Class Player

java.lang.Object
model.Player
public class Player extends Object
The Player class represents a player in the game. Each player has a name, a list of objectives, a pawn, and observers to track their pawn's movements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Constructs a Player with the specified name.
